content: round 3 k 14 16 k2tog k2 yo k1 yo k2 s1 k1 psso k 33 39 round 4 k 56 64 round 5 k14 16 k1 k2tog yo k3 yo s1 k1 psso k1 k33 39 round 6 k 56 64 repeat rounds 1-6 3 more times or until you have reached your desire leg length once you ve knit to your desired leg length you re ready to start the heel flap heel flap set up knit across the n1 and n2 continuing with the written instructions for right or left sock will be round 1 these will be the front of the sock or instep and these stitches will not be worked again until after the heel flap and heel turn are finished 3 © the kitchen sink shop heel flap for the heel flap and heel turn you will only be working with the 28 32 stitches that are now on n3 and n4 in row 1 you will be working all stitches from both n3 and n4 onto n3 therefore combining those 28 32 stitches onto one needle for the heel flap and heel turn n1 and n2 are now the front instep of the sock and n3 will hold the 28 32 stitches from n3 and n4 row 1 rs *s1 knit wise k1* to end row 2 ws turn work around so now the purl side of n3 is facing you s1 purl wise p to end turn work row 3 rs *s1 knit wise k1* to end turn work row 4 ws s1 purl wise p to end turn work repeat row 3 and 4 above 12 14 more times for a total of 28 32 row you will be ending with a purl row turn your work you will start the heel turn with a knit row heel turn the heel turn continues only with the stitches on n3 row 1 rs k 16 19 ssk k1 turn work row 2 ws s1 purl wise p 5 7 p2tog p1 turn work row 3 rs s1 knit wise k to one stitch before the gap created when your work was turned on the previous row ssk k1 turn work row 4 ws s1 purl wise p to one stitch before the gap p2tog p1 turn work repeat row 3 and row 4 until you have worked all the stitches you will have 16 20 stitches left on your needle and you will end with a purl row turn your work and knit across the heel flap n3 placing a stitch marker after 8 10 stitches which is the halfway point now you re ready to start the heel gusset heel gusset now you ll continue working in the round again with rs of n3 facing you pick up and knit 14 16 stitches from along the side of the heel flap onto n3 pick up 1 extra stitch at the corner of the instep to eliminate having a small gap in
